thread.title: Nicki Minaj Collection Discontinued at Kmart, According to Retailer's Tweet | Billboard
thread.title_full: Nicki Minaj Collection Discontinued at Kmart, According to Retailer's Tweet | Billboard

author: Ashley Iasimone
title: Nicki Minaj Collection Discontinued at Kmart, According to Retailer's Tweet | Billboard
text:
COMMENTS Kevin Winter/Getty Images Nicki Minaj performs onstage during the 2016 American Music Awards at Microsoft Theater on Nov. 20, 2016 in Los Angeles. 
Kmart may be dropping the Nicki Minaj Collection, the rapper's apparel line, according to news circulating on social media Saturday (Feb. 25). 
"Due to a dramatic decrease in sales, Nicki Minaj's clothing line will soon be discontinued," Twitter handle @KmartFashions tweeted . 
While the @KmartFashions account does not appear to be affiliated with the company -- the Minaj update is its only public tweet -- another user shared the tweet with Kmart's official Twitter account (along with the message "tell me you guys arent serious right now"), and the company tweeted back. 
"We're sad to see Nicki leaves us too," Kmart wrote in response. @aintshitfofree We're sad to see Nicki leaves us too. :( â€” Kmart (@Kmart) February 25, 2017 
A search on Kmart's website shows that almost all of the current merchandise in Minaj's clothing line is on sale, with many pieces marked down at 40 percent off retail price. Despite the slashed prices, Kmart has not confirmed the news beyond the above tweet. 
At press time, reps for Kmart have not responded to Billboard 's request for comment.
